instructions: You'll need to rename this file to secrets-debug.json, fill all the values below and remove this line.
youtubeAPIkey: YouTube API key here. Obtain one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials
walletSeed: 64 character hex string with the wallet seed
jwtKey: 64 character hex string with the key used to sign and encrypt auth tokens
representative: Banano address of the representative the address used in the system should use

telemetry.statsdAddress: address:port of statsd server where telemetry should be sent. Remove the telemetry entry altogether to disable
telemetry.statsdPrefix: prefix used for the statsd metrics

raffleSecretKey: 64 character hex string with the secret key used to calculate weekly raffle results
modLogWebhook: last two parts of the of Discord webhook URL. Remove this entry if you don't want to send moderation logs to a Discord channel
tenorAPIkey: Get an API token at https://tenor.com/developer/dashboard
nanswapAPIkey: Optional, get an API token at https://nanswap.com/API
